FuncDef:
The lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh timer command configures an IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value.
The undo lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh timer command restores the default IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value. The lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh timer command configures an IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value. The undo lsp-remaining-lifetime refresh timer command restores the default IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value. By default, the IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value is the maximum LSP age.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value.
The value is an integer ranging from the maximum LSP age to 65535, in seconds.

Sets the IS-IS LSP Remaining Lifetime value to the maximum LSP age.
-
